item.description:
David Wolfe Speaking at RISD: Cracking the Chocolate Code


From the event web site:
"David will Crack into all aspects of this extraordinary plant, including its environmentally friendly properties and the health benefits of eating raw cacao. Cacao is a "superfood," rich in magnesium, which helps to balance brain chemistry, build strong bones and boost feelings of happiness. it is a key ingredient for creating vibrant health...in ourselves and the Earth."

Event web site:
http://www.davidwolfe...

Tickets: $30, Students $10.
http://www.davidwolfe...

RISD Map and driving directions:
http://www.risd.edu/p...

MapQuest Map:
http://www.mapquest.c...

Event contact: risdcacao@gmail.com

Mara, the assistant organizer of this group whom you can email directly, will be attending this event.

In addition to what we have to offer at the Boston Raw Meetup group, please visit
http://www.NewEngland... .
item.name: David Wolfe Speaking at RISD: Cracking the Chocolate Code
